mapper.select:
select u.id as "id", u.name as "name", u.username as "username", u.password as "pwd", u.departmentId as "depId", u.townId as "townId", dept.name as "depName", town.name as "townName", u.roleId as "roleId" from t_user u left join t_department dept on dept.id = u.departmentId left join t_town town on town.id = u.townId
u.username=#{username}

select u.id as "id", u.name as "name", u.username as "username", u.password as "pwd", u.departmentId as "depId", u.townId as "townId", dept.name as "depName", town.name as "townName", u.roleId as "roleId" from t_user u left join t_department dept on dept.id = u.departmentId left join t_town town on town.id = u.townId

townId=#{townId} and departmentId=#{departmentId}
